meanings.definition: To give an account of something in words.
meanings.sent1: She describes her favorite book to her friend.
meanings.sent2: The detective describes the suspect's appearance to the police.
meanings.sent3: The parrot describes the scene in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: Her painting skillfully describes the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: His poem vividly describes the feeling of loneliness.

meanings.definition: To represent or give an account of in words.
meanings.sent1: The artist describes his emotions through his paintings.
meanings.sent2: The journalist describes the event in detail in the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The comedian describes a hilarious situation on stage.
meanings.sent4: Her song lyrically describes the journey of life.
meanings.sent5: The author vividly describes the magical world in the book.

meanings.definition: To trace the outline of something.
meanings.sent1: She describes the shape of the cloud in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The architect describes the building's structure on paper.
meanings.sent3: The child describes a funny face on the foggy window.
meanings.sent4: The dancer describes a graceful movement with her body.
meanings.sent5: The map vividly describes the route to the hidden treasure.
